author: timbeiko
content:
Here are how I'd propose amending the process doc based on the conversations above and a bit of outreach to L2s, LSTs and infra providers over the past week: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/1715

We can discuss on ACDC tomorrow, but IMO we should agree to the process in the abstract before discussing specific Fusaka dates. The one Fusaka exception to consider is forking Holesky, which is an EOL testnet.
